definitions.title: n.pr.loc. 1
definitions.body: in the Shephelah of Judah (Buhl:Geogr. 194) Jos 15:36, Sakareim, LXXL Sebareim; ´[[דֶּרֶח שׁ]]: 1Sa 17:52 (LXX tw=n pulw=n).
in the Negeb (Simeon), [[וּבְשַׁעֲרָָיִוֹ]] 1Ch 4:31, Sewreim, LXXL Saarim; = [[שָׁרוּחֶָן]] (q.v.) Jos 19:6, and perhaps [[שִׁלְחִיוֹ]] (in Negeb of Judah) Jos 15:32; Buhl:Geogr. m. 185.
